Flimbo
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017, 12:34:59 AM

You're prolly gonna need to find you a crafter to do the job specific. Ososis is mastered and active for THW. Frunk is mastered, possibly active. Two handed swords are the longest forge of any weapon (7 cycles), so really nobody makes them to sell unless it's a custom order. Takes 50-120% longer to make 'em but you can't charge 50-100% more on the regular market without people complaining, so they're avoided like the plague.
